document_data.mainbody:
Huk was a goblin warrior that served Dror Ragzlin and the Cult of the Absolute in the Shattered Sanctum during the late 15 century DR.
He followed Dror Ragzlins every word and did not like others interrupting the boss speeches.
Huk was present when the boss Dror Ragzlin attempted to speak with a dead mind flayer brought into their sanctuary in the . The mighty hobgoblin leader was attempting to extract information crucial to the Absolute and her plans for the Sword Coast.
